# 使⽤ MXNet Gluon 来动⼿学深度学习 0.4

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shi-mxnet-gluon-laidong-xue-shendu-xuexi-0-4
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shi-mxnet-gluon-laidong-xue-shendu-xuexi-0-4
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shi-mxnet-gluon-laidong-xue-shendu-xuexi-0-4
shi-mxnet-gluon-laidong-xue-shendu-xuexi-0-4 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shi-mxnet-gluon-laidong-xue-shendu-xuexi-0-4
shi-mxnet-gluon-laidong-xue-shendu-xuexi-0-4 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
